info.author: Carnegie Mellon University datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: The Gradebook import is a tab-delimited text file containing gradebook values for each student and item.
info.details:
The first row contains the gradebook item names.
The first column contains unique student IDs.
All other cells are numbers -- the score the student (row) had on this item (column).
Empty cells are assigned a value of 0.0.
Optionally, the last column can be a summary column, containing the student's total score.
info.outputs: Gradebook file suitable for use in Correlation or Cronbach's Alpha Analysis components.
